title: Amazon's record-low AirPods 4 price is perfect for nailing down stocking stuffers
description: The record-breaking AirPods 4 price drop is in stock at Amazon while supplies last, putting the earbuds with Active Noise Cancellation in your hands in just a few days.Grab the lowest price ever on AirPods 4 with ANC.Every model of AirPods is on sale for the holidays, but we're following a fresh price drop on AirPods 4 with Active Noise Cancellation, which are down to $138.99. This is the lowest price ever on the 2024 release, which includes a redesign for added comfort and greater stability. Continue Reading on AppleInsider | Discuss on our Forums
author: Christine McKee
excerpt: The record-breaking AirPods 4 price drop is in stock at Amazon while supplies last, putting the earbuds with Active Noise Cancellation in your hands in just a few days.
text: Grab the lowest price ever on AirPods 4 with ANC. The record-breaking AirPods 4 price drop is in stock at Amazon while supplies last, putting the earbuds with Active Noise Cancellation in your hands in just a few days. Every model of AirPods is on sale for the holidays, but we're following a fresh price drop on AirPods 4 with Active Noise Cancellation, which are down to $138.99. This is the lowest price ever on the 2024 release, which includes a redesign for added comfort and greater stability. AirPods 4 without ANC: $119 ($10 off) at Amazon & B&H AirPods 4 with ANC: $138.99 ($41 off) AirPods Pro 2 USB-C: $169.99 ($80 off) AirPods Max Over-Ear Headphones with Lightning Charging: $469 ($80 off) AirPods Max Over-Ear Headphones with USB-C Charging: $529 ($20 off) In our AirPods 4 review, the earbuds received a 4-star rating out of 5 thanks to ANC being reliable for an open-ear design. We also liked how Apple finally moved the entire AirPods lineup to USB-C (although you can still find a few closeout AirPods deals on Lightning models).
html:
Grab the lowest price ever on AirPods 4 with ANC.

The record-breaking AirPods 4 price drop is in stock at Amazon while supplies last, putting the earbuds with Active Noise Cancellation in your hands in just a few days.

Every model of AirPods is on sale for the holidays, but we're following a fresh price drop on AirPods 4 with Active Noise Cancellation, which are down to $138.99. This is the lowest price ever on the 2024 release, which includes a redesign for added comfort and greater stability.

  • AirPods 4 without ANC: $119 ($10 off) at Amazon & B&H
  • AirPods 4 with ANC: $138.99 ($41 off)
  • AirPods Pro 2 USB-C: $169.99 ($80 off)
  • AirPods Max Over-Ear Headphones with Lightning Charging: $469 ($80 off)
  • AirPods Max Over-Ear Headphones with USB-C Charging: $529 ($20 off)

In our AirPods 4 review, the earbuds received a 4-star rating out of 5 thanks to ANC being reliable for an open-ear design. We also liked how Apple finally moved the entire AirPods lineup to USB-C (although you can still find a few closeout AirPods deals on Lightning models).
